content.raw: Oof, I was in the middle of following Brian’s work around suggestions when I got the notice that Carlos had restored. I guess there is a notification delay. Anyway, Carlos, your tweaks seem mostly to correspond to your comments from before plus some formatting. Those look fine to me but let me know if you think I’m missing something.
